series_list.rise_message:
Morning Star (VIII), Sleipnir's Tail (VIII), and Raijin's Vest (VIII) added to Relic Draw!
From 5:00 PM 7/21 PST (1:00 AM 7/22 UTC) to 4:59 PM 7/31 PST (12:59 AM 8/1 UTC) the drop rate of these items plus Minotaur Plate (VIII), Fujin's Chakram (VIII), Balamb Garden Uniform (VIII), and Blitz Sword (VIII) is increased relative to other 5★ equipment. After this period ends, the drop rate of these items will decrease to the drop rate of other 5★ equipment.
NOTE: An increase in the drop rate of an item compared to other items of the same rarity does not mean that the likelihood of receiving that item increases against other rarities (e.g. 5★ vs. 4★). To compare the rarity of 1★, 2★, 3★, 4★, and 5★ items in general, and the likelihood of receiving any rarity against other rarities, please see Menu > Help > Other > About Rarity.

series_list.rise_message:
Partisan (VI), Kaiser Knuckles (VI), and Golden Shield (VI) added to Relic Draw!
From 5:00 PM 7/28 PST (1:00 AM 7/29 UTC) to 4:59 PM 8/7 PST (12:59 AM 8/8 UTC) the drop rate of these items plus Hawkeye (VI), Thunder Blade (VI), Mystery Veil (VI), and Golden Spear (VI) is increased relative to other 5★ equipment. After this period ends, the drop rate of these items will decrease to the drop rate of other 5★ equipment.
NOTE: An increase in the drop rate of an item compared to other items of the same rarity does not mean that the likelihood of receiving that item increases against other rarities (e.g. 5★ vs. 4★). To compare the rarity of 1★, 2★, 3★, 4★, and 5★ items in general, and the likelihood of receiving any rarity against other rarities, please see Menu > Help > Other > About Rarity.
